source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.
source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts

items.title: Indian Saree Blouse Stitching Course For Beginners

visible_instructors.name: Praseela
visible_instructors.title: Praseela N
visible_instructors.job_title: Entrepreneur, Diploma holder in soaps and cosmetics

items.headline: step by step guide how to stitch Indian Saree Blouse in professional way by your own
objectives_summary: By learning this course you can stitch your own Saree Blouse in professional way and can take orders too.

items.title: Realism - How to Paint Eyes with Color Pencil
items.headline: Learn to create photorealistic eyes with a step-by-step system, taught by Vicky Van Houten!
objectives_summary: Color pencil
Realism
Technique for creating realistic iris

items.title: How to Draw For Kids: 16 Art Projects for Kids and Beginners

visible_instructors.name: Moses
visible_instructors.title: Moses Sabayi
visible_instructors.job_title: Become a Master in Drawing and Painting

items.headline: This course with 16 lessons  may be just what you are looking for to help your child grow as an Artist. Ages 7+
objectives_summary: How to color and shade Animals (Fish)
How to color and shade Animals (Fish)

items.title: Learn to Draw a Real Life Still LIfe

visible_instructors.name: Amy
visible_instructors.title: Amy Stewart
visible_instructors.job_title: New York Times Bestselling Author & Artist

items.headline: With Ink and Watercolor
objectives_summary: How to identify a "real life" still life
How to compose a still life
How to draw a still life with a single line

items.title: Fundamentals of Watercolours for Beginners and Beyond Part 2
items.headline: This is a course for the beginner to learn fundamental lessons about drawing that will enable the student to progress
objectives_summary: In the first two lessons the student will learn the basics of the colour wheel, where colours are located on the wheel, along with their compliments.
The next lesson will cover buildings and how to make them more interesting, in both the drawing and painting.
We will next cover the painting of individual trees as well as the trees in the landscape,

items.title: Paper and non-paper surfaces for watercolor painting
items.headline: Watercolor tools series
objectives_summary: This class gives very important information on choosing substrate to paint watercolor on. Section 1 discusses the traditionally used watercolor paper: types, textures and best choice for various techniques. Section 2 describes alternative, modern surfaces like Aquabord, watercolor canvas as well as creating your own watercolor surface out of virtually anything.

items.title: How to Paint Flowers Step by Step
items.headline: Discover the Creative Process and Create an Original Floral Painting
objectives_summary: How to draw many types of flowers
Simple painting techniques
How to create a painting from what you've learned

items.title: Sunrise Oil Pastel Painting
items.headline: Paint-along art lesson
objectives_summary: Create an entire painting in one sitting.
Learn to bring depth to the painting.
I will show you different techniques like Heavy Pressure Blending, Light Pressure Blending, Color Mixing, Stippling, Scum-bling, sgraffito as and when required.

items.title: Drawing and Sketching Cute Animals with Pen
items.headline: Fantastic Animals and How to Draw Them
objectives_summary: Drawing creatively.
Basic shadow drawing technique with pen.
Draw any animals from round circle.

items.title: Drawing for Beginners: How to Draw 25 Cartoons Step-by-Step
items.headline: Cartoon Drawing Lessons: An Inspiring Art Experience for Young Artists. Follow Me as I Teach Beginners How to Draw!
objectives_summary: Create 25+ spectacular cartoon drawings.
Participate in an activity that cultivates critical thinking skills, develops hand-eye coordination, and encourages self-expression.
Apply the knowledge gained in this course to create unique masterpieces.

items.title: Introduction To Fluid Art
items.headline: 5 Steps To Becoming a Paint Pouring Artist
objectives_summary: develop the skills and knowledge of paint pouring
create their own Paint Pouring masterpiece

items.title: Calligraphy: The Basics
items.headline: Tips and hints to help you get started on your calligraphic journey
objectives_summary: Acquire the elementary knowledge you need before going on to learn calligraphy.

items.title: Learn to Make Bath and Body Products
items.headline: Make your own luxury products and learn some science too.
objectives_summary: By the end of the course you'll be able to make your cosmetics using simple ingredients found in grocery stores.
You'll learn about some of the science behind formulating cosmetics
Have some great products to share with your friends and family

items.title: Learn to sew with a sewing machine
items.headline: A course to teach you how to sew using a sewing machine.
objectives_summary: How to pick a sewing machine
Basic sewing supplies
Sewing Machine safety

items.title: How To Free Hand Draw with Square Drawing Grids
items.headline: Learn to draw with pinpoint accuracy using a pencil and transparent grids. Copy your own photographs and scale up
objectives_summary: Effectively use a Square Drawing System to draw their own pictures
Understand how to draw accurate and precise drawings using grids

items.title: 書道LEVEL1: Mindful Japanese Calligraphy for Beginners 1-2/30
items.headline: SHODO by Nohoh-Method: The Complete KAISHO Style! Basic Srokes & KANJIs. WITHOUT Japanese Knowledge! Creative & Relaxed
objectives_summary: Be able to manage two basic strokes and two Ideographs (KANJIs) of Japanese calligraphy in Kaisho style
Learn the basic knowledge of the Japanese Calligraphy SHODO
Learn about the proper tools for SHODO and how to use them
